attributes.action: Make it illegal for companies and local authorities to require a persons date of birth and other personal information for "Data Protection" purposes without having a legal requirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the high amounts of I.D. theft in the UK, giving personal details to unauthorised bodies such as private companies and local authorities to be used for "data protection" purposes, or information held without having a legal requirement for that personal information as laid down by statute, is an unsafe method currently used despite the Data Protection Act, thus giving criminals personal information they crave to obtain goods and services at our expence. Personal information held by companies and local authorities is open to temptation and abuse by any criminal eliment with access to their computers. It also can be used and often is, by any company to gain an advantage by targeting your particular age group with high pressure sales techniques. Giving a date of birth for "data protection" or other information, could easily be replaced with a memorable word or password of a persons choice.
